(:action select ; Select an option and update relevant statuses
  :parameters (?entity - object ?context - object)
  :precondition (and (not (selected ?entity ?context)))
  :effect (selected ?entity ?context)
)

(:action move
  :parameters (?p1 - player ?p2 - player ?s - stage ?pos1 - position ?pos2 - position)
  :precondition (and 
                  (location ?pos1 ?p1 ?s)
                  (not (location ?pos2 ?p1 ?s))
                  (not (location ?pos2 ?p2 ?s))
                  (or (together ?p1 ?p2) (away_from_wall ?p1))
                )
  :effect (and 
            (location ?pos2 ?p1 ?s)
            (location ?pos2 ?p2 ?s)
            (not (location ?pos1 ?p1 ?s))
